full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD CING GSOL GDAB PA'I TSUL DGE LEGS GTER MDZOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(TSUL 'DI YANG ^SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG LCANG SKYA YE SHES BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I MCHOG GSUM SPYI'I MCHOD CHOG YID BZHIN DBANG RGYAL GYIS GZHI BYAS, ^RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SOGS DAM PA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG GIS ZUR BRGYAN TE, ^SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG THA SHAL BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS DGOS DBANG GIS RAG RIM ZHIG BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
